doc.title: Josie's Lalaland
doc.plot: Josie had been a leukemia patient for many years. After being told her condition is terminal, she decided to go home and reunite with her family. This animation starts with a girl's voice, as if a young soul is entering a world between earth and heaven. As the film progress, the creatures in the mysterious land start to gather. Finally, our little girl sublimates in a cluster of golden flowers.
